title: How to counter zed hard (post 6)

replies.body:

hell, whatever works

Those are for graphics shadows, Zed's shadows are unaffected.

Or you can ban him and deal with {{champion:55}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:7}}  instead.
EDIT: Dayyummm... didn't expect 8 likes.. c:
Or you could just purchase a QSS, and remove his ult completely before it pops.

You know, it's not like 90% of Zed's damage is physical damage.
Man, I need a {{item:3140}}.

Except QSS can remove 50% of that physical damage.
So yes, you do need a qss

How about we do some math, hm?
Let's say that we are being ulted by a level 18 Zed, with 400 AD (including W passive). This Zed ults, lands his Q, E, and a basic attack, not including his innate passive.
His Q deals 522 damage, his E deals 410 damage, and his basic attack 400 more, which totals to 1332 damage.
Zed's ult deals 100% AD plus 50% of the damage dealt to the target, so 400 + 666 (oh wow, not intentional, but OK) which is 1066.
So no, if you get ulted by a level 18 Zed who lands his full combo, you fucked, 50% is too little for this Fed Zed.
Of course, this is completely exaggerated to prove that you should probably be building tons of fucking armor to deal with this insane damage from Fed Zed over there.
QSS won't save you from the other 1332 damage this guy is throwing at us.
1332 damage as burst is trash late game

If you did the math with me, you'd know...
that it's actually 2398 damage, plus the missing damage from Zed's passive, which would make this more of 2500+.
That means he could 100-0 a squishy ADC or mid laner in 3 seconds.
Pretty trashy.
Which is why you have qss you nard.

And then you realize that his aa deal 1.2k damage and QWE is almost his health. Again y do you need qss if you are still fucked? It is good to have qss in team fights but if u get caught u r fucked and that is all. Zanyas? Zanyas? R again
lets just ignore the 1.5k damage he deals without the ult pop because that doesnt exist

"1.5k damage"

Maybe if you let him go 6/0 in lane with 275 CS at 25 minutes, sure

As if you can stop him from getting 275 cs.
At 25 minutes 275 cs is pretty crazy on anyone including Zed lets be real
That much cs at 25 isn't even seen that often in pro games. Really if he has that much then you should be more than good enough to know how to stop him.
You can actually. You just have to not be retarded.

> [{quoted}](name=colesy4971,realm=EUW,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=IvNXda1g,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-04-19T11:04:13.566+0000)
>
> lets just ignore the 1.5k damage he deals without the ult pop because that doesnt exist

it does however much AD he has which the average zed build would be 375~ 400 maybe unless its a full AD zed then 500-525 and if tis full AD then 1 armor item makes him do negative damage

actually i build {{item:3072}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3142}}  
and get easily over 500 ad

> [{quoted}](name=SoIo Lane or AFK,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=IvNXda1g,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-19T07:39:26.887+0000)
>
> Or you could just purchase a QSS, and remove his ult completely before it pops.

And have useless MR because Zed deals physical damage
and realize then that he is a melee champion and if you don't know how to cc/kite a melee champion you don't deserve to be allowed to play League of legends.

Ah yes, let me kite your two gap closers, your slow, your ranged spells, and your speed boost (Youmuu's, see it a lot).  All while not having a dash or hard cc.  Yup, I must be terrible if I can't kite you.

The point is that it removes his debuff, which actually helps a lot since he deals 20% increased damage to whoever has the ultimate mark and then the pop on top of it. This doesn't mean you dont need armor/health to survive him, but it will significantly reduce his damage output to you if he is consistantly ultimating you. Basically it just makes it so he cant instanuke you, but has to stay around to finish the kill (actually commiting) and your team can capitalize and kill him before he can finish the job is the hope
TLDR: {{item:3140}} end all beat all against zed? no way. Does it help a lot? yes, yes it does.
You could just play swain.
or cho, or kayle
Just ban him
Ban him? LOL
meanwhile he has 550 ad and around 1.2 as to attack you but it's k he's silenced.

or he went with the IE build and just kills the ADC with two hits without even proccing deathmark to begin with.
Soraka is really strong to counter panth though.

Well known fact: Your teammate will flash/dash/run out of the silence zone before Zed appears.  I played Soraka a few times for this exact purpose, in 2 out of 3 matches, my ADC would use their dash immediately and bring Zed to safety.

(I tried waiting until Zed appears to place the zone, which kinda works, but Zed can get off his Q+E+BotRK+Ignite in about .2s.)

How to counter Zed: type in chat "/mute (Zed player's summoner name)" and you won't have to deal with all the BM you'd otherwise be guaranteed to receive over allchat. Tried this last time I saw a Zed and it worked like a charm, I could tell from his movements that he was spamming laugh but it was blissfully inaudible to me.
" kill the motherfucker since all he can do is auto" xD I read that in shreks voice for whatever reason
Also works against {{champion:55}} . Man, pre-change Soraka was easier, since all you do is point & click on them.
mid lane soraka, let's go boyz!
still viable, just takes more skill :/

Yeah, you go pick {{champion:16}}.

Competent {{champion:238}} will wait for you to drop E in teamfights then go for you instead. Because you know, Soraka has no escape. 

When playing against {{champion:16}}, you go for the healer first. Always.

That means when YOU are playing {{champion:16}}, you have to play like a little bitch and take minimum risk. Be afraid of getting in E range, because that will fk you over.

Countering Zed with most mechanics isn't fun, heck using {{champion:26}} ult is probably more fun because he can take less risk using his E. [ ZILEAN CURRENTLY IS A BAD CHAMPION TOO ]
